original_title: I Think I Will Need Some Bodyguards
overview: Jerome Bentley has made an impression on His sales agent when his first independent film netted him $145,000. She encourages him to relocate to work with Her bigger studio associates but Jerome has been keeping tabs on the entertainment industry and feels its dangerous. He recruits bodyguards in preparation for the journey but it seems that he is the real threat.
title: I Think I Will Need Some Bodyguards
